and( d.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or e.DOLL_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and c.STATE = #{pd.STATE}
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DOLL_PLAY_DETAIL ( DOLLID, USERID, CREATE_DATE, GUESS_ID, GOLD, CONVERSIONGOLD, TOY_ID ) VALUES ( #{DOLLID}, #{USERID}, now(), #{GUESS_ID}, #{GOLD}, #{CONVERSIONGOLD}, #{TOY_ID} )
mapper.select: SELECT * from TB_DOLL_PLAY_DETAIL WHERE DOLLID = #{DOLLID} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC limit 1
SELECT * from TB_DOLL_PLAY_DETAIL WHERE DOLLID= #{DOLLID} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC limit 0,1
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_DOLL_PLAY_DETAIL SET STOP_FLAG = #{STOP_FLAG}, REWARD_NUM = #{REWARD_NUM} WHERE GUESS_ID = #{GUESS_ID}
UPDATE TB_DOLL_PLAY_DETAIL SET STATE = #{STATE}, POST_STATE = #{POST_STATE}, FREE_DATE = now() WHERE GUESS_ID = #{GUESS_ID} AND DOLLID = #{DOLLID}
mapper.select: SELECT h.* FROM (select d.DOLL_NAME, d.doll_url, dd.ID, dd.USERID, dd.GUESS_ID, dd.DOLLID, dd.STATE, dd.CREATE_DATE, dd.GOLD, dd.CAMERA_DATE, dd.STOP_FLAG,dd.CONVERSIONGOLD,dd.POST_STATE,dd.SENDGOODS,dd.SEND_ORDER_ID,u.NICKNAME,u.IMAGE_URL from tb_doll_play_detail as dd inner join sys_app_doll as d on d.doll_id = dd.dollid inner join sys_app_user as u on u.user_id = dd.userid where u.user_id = #{USERID} and dd.state = '1') AS h order by h.POST_STATE ASC

SELECT D.*, ad.DOLL_NAME, au.CNEE_NAME from ( select t.DOLLID, t.USERID, t.CONVERSIONGOLD, COUNT(1) as COUNT from tb_doll_play_detail t where t.USERID=#{ USERID} AND t.state = '1' group by DOLLID,USERID,CONVERSIONGOLD ) d,sys_app_doll ad,sys_app_user au WHERE ad.DOLL_ID=d.DOLLID and au.USER_ID=d.USERID and d.USERID=#{ USERID}

select u.nickname,u.IMAGE_URL,d.doll_name from tb_doll_play_detail as dd inner join sys_app_doll as d on d.doll_id = dd.dollid inner join sys_app_user as u on u.user_id = dd.userid WHERE dd.STATE = '1' ORDER BY dd.CREATE_DATE DESC limit 0,10
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_doll_play_detail SET SENDGOODS = #{SENDGOODS}, POST_STATE = #{POST_STATE} WHERE ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: SELECT d.DOLL_NAME, d.doll_url, dd.ID, dd.USERID, dd.GUESS_ID, dd.DOLLID, dd.STATE, dd.CREATE_DATE, dd.GOLD, dd.CAMERA_DATE, dd.STOP_FLAG,dd.CONVERSIONGOLD,dd.POST_STATE,dd.SENDGOODS,u.NICKNAME,u.IMAGE_URL from tb_doll_play_detail as dd inner join sys_app_doll as d on d.doll_id = dd.dollid inner join sys_app_user as u on u.user_id = dd.userid WHERE dd.ID=#{ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_doll_play_detail SET POST_STATE = #{POST_STATE}, SEND_ORDER_ID = #{SEND_ORDER_ID} WHERE ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: select * from tb_doll_play_detail where state = '1' and post_state = '0'

SELECT b1.ALLCOUNT,b2.SUCCOUNT,b2.SUCCOUNT/b1.ALLCOUNT as SUCPROBABILITY,b3.FAILCOUNT,b3.FAILCOUNT/b1.ALLCOUNT as FAILPROBABILITY from (
(select COUNT(1) as ALLCOUNT from TB_DOLL_PLAY_DETAIL c ) b1
LEFT JOIN
(select COUNT(1) as SUCCOUNT from TB_DOLL_PLAY_DETAIL c where c.STATE='1' ) b2 on 1=1
LEFT JOIN
(select COUNT(1) as FAILCOUNT from TB_DOLL_PLAY_DETAIL c where c.STATE='0') b3 ON 1=1
)
